titles.title: Lease Lot Conveyance Act of 2000
To direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain properties in the vicinity of the Elephant Butte Reservoir and the Caballo Reservoir, New Mexico.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.

term.name: Federal aid to water resources development

bill.summary: 10/2/2000--Introduced. Lease Lot Conveyance Act of 2000 - Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey to the Elephant Butte/Caballo Leaseholders Association, Inc., real property comprising 403 cabin sites under the administrative jurisdiction of the Bureau of Reclamation that are located along the western portion of the reservoirs in Elephant Butte State Park and Caballo State Park, New Mexico.Requires the Association to grant leaseholders of such properties the option of purchasing or continuing to lease their properties.Requires the Secretary to establish specified use restrictions with respect to each property.Requires conveyance proceeds to be deposited in the reclamation fund on behalf of the Rio Grande Project.
